CustomField.inlineHelpText: A - Excellent housekeeping with all facilities in perfect order, very tidy appearance internally and externally B - Good housekeeping with all facilities in good order, tidy appearance internally and externally C - Acceptable housekeeping with facilities in acceptable order, site acceptably clean, room for improvement D - Poor housekeeping, disorganised, repair and maintenance limited and infrequent, visually untidy with clutter, requires major improvement
CustomField.label: Farm Rating
